title: Odohu
author: Odohu
content: My people, una don hear say CBN don direct all banks to lift all the restrictions wey them sama give some accounts wey dey do business in cryptocurrency and other finTech. To me. This na better news for us wey dey for the crypto industry. Make una no forget say, the action of CBN be slow down cryptocurrency businesses and activities for our country as many people who for dey use crypto come dey comot body to avoid wahala from our government. Even GTB been carry the matter for head come dey close account of people wey them notice say na crypto or forex them dey do.   But as e be say them don give greenlight say people dey free to use crypto, we go dey expect say crypto will have greater penetration for our country and that na good thing. This na the article for people wey wan read the full gist:https://www.primebusiness.africa/cbn-orders-nigerian-banks-to-lift-restriction-on-accounts-of-crypto-other-firms/My people how una see the matter?

comments.author: SmartGold01
comments.body: Well this is a good news but no longer good news to interest people anymore since they can't do anything without attaching values to it, why from experience as a Nigerian Lady, our government does what will only favour them. In other words what do I mean, since this restrictions are being lifted from their users there is every tendency that any account that involves themselves with cryptocurrency trading there must be a specific fee or percentages to be withdrawn to keep milking her citizens and I know the person on seat as a task collector who doesn't do anything without attaching values to it.This is Africa so there's nothing to be over joy of since they can't simply acts straight without attaching value to it.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Even though am not a doubting Thomas but not until i see more people and banks back to using crypto and making payments from the financial institutions, i may not believe anything about this, i also expected the news to have circulated more than this because it's something that should attract more discussion on since everyone into bitcoin is involved, if truly the ban is lifted then we should also see other news channels taking this up for trending because am not trusting the source alone here, don't know if other members have more confirmations on this approval to be true.

comments.author: Zanab247
comments.body: If this news Is real , congratulations to us in this house because we have been praying for it to come so that we will start purchasing goods in the country and pay with BTC. I believe that this new government will not joke with CBN banned on crypto and BTC in the country  because the new president is a someone that has idea on decentralized business and he has use it to build Lagos when he was a governor. And during his campaign he made mention of cryptocurrency that made me to believe that crypto users will breath in this new government.

comments.body: Hmmm,great relief so finally our prayer don answer.
